sentences.sContent: The president rebuked the House and Senate for not passing those bills within 100 days.
sentences.sCn: 总统谴责参众两院未在100天内通过那些法案。

synos.tran: 指责，非难；制止；使相形见绌

phrases.pCn: 无可指摘的；无可非议的

remMethod.val: re(再次)＋buk(=beat打) ＋e → 反复打 → 指责

trans.tranOther: to speak to someone severely about something they have done wrong
